english.segment1: I need the kind of girl that knows a girl that. Likes to wear my clothes somone who always. Buys me coke someone who laughs at all my. Jokes that's the girl that I want to see fall in love. With me that's the girl that I long to know oh. How I love her so I'm looking for a girl who. Writes me songs and talks to Jesus all day long. And the way she does her hair no one else. Can compare I'll probably meet her at a show. When I look at her I'll know that she's the. Perfect one for me and with her I will always. Be the one for me.
